data.author: The Device

changelog.release_notes:
Bugfixing
- 100% full charged battery now displayed correctly

Under the hood
- Better handling of weather icons

Work in progress
- Settings page (temperature scale choice).

Inspired by "Minimal Clean" by Kunal Gautam (Link : pebble://appstore/557eb7fcbb3773ef7d000008).
Added bluetooth status (with vibration on disconnect).
Through openweathermap i've added:
Location (up center), actual temperature (Celsius - left bottom corner), actual weather icon (left bottom), actual weather description (bottom center), next weather icon (forecast 3h) (right bottom) and next temperature (forecast 3h).

This watchfaces updates weather infos every 30 minutes or when shaked.

Thanks to Kunal for the base code and inspiration.

data.description:
Inspired by "Minimal Clean" by Kunal Gautam (Link : pebble://appstore/557eb7fcbb3773ef7d000008).
Added bluetooth status (with vibration on disconnect).
Through openweathermap i've added: 
- Location (up center)
- Actual temperature (Celsius - left bottom corner)
- Actual weather icon (left bottom)
- Actual weather description (bottom center)
- Next weather icon (forecast 3h) (right bottom)
- Next temperature (forecast 3h). 

This watchface updates weather infos every 30 minutes or when shaked. 

Thanks to Kunal for the base code and inspiration.
Thanks to Little Gem Software (Trekv2 watchface) for the weather icons
Thanks to Turner Vink (Vacation Time) for the "update on tap" idea.
data.title: Minimal Clean Revisited
